002
003package es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.corenlpentityextraction.xml.definition;
004
005import javax.xml.bind.annotation.XmlRootElement;
006
007import edu.stanford.nlp.pipeline.TokensRegexNERAnnotator;
008import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.xml.definition.AbstractProcessingStepParameter;
009
010/**
011 * Parameter for specifying the named entity categories that the resulting
012 * {@link TokensRegexNERAnnotator} named entity term mapping file will be able
013 * to override.
014 * <p>
015 * For example, if a NER model recognizes "measles" as CAUSE_OF_DEATH, but the
016 * mapping file indicates that it is a DISEASE, then it will be marked as a
017 * DISEASE if and only if CAUSE_OF_DEATH is a overwritable named entity type.
018 * </p>
019 * <p>
020 * If the value of this parameter is the empty string, no categories will be
021 * overriden (excluding defaults).
022 * </p>
023 *
024 * @author Alejandro González García
025 */
026@XmlRootElement(name = "overwritableNerCategories")
027public final class OverwritableNERCategoriesStepParameter extends AbstractProcessingStepParameter {}
